channel.title: My run.bat Opens and close immidiately (server sided)
channel.description:
Hello, my run.bat opens and close immidiately after i opened it.
Here is my run.bat [code]@echo off title Exilium Server start java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]
I cant get a pic of the error since its to fast. But it looks like this
http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/5503/16252bca5e644e53a23a28d.png

item.title: My run.bat Opens and close immidiately (server sided)
item.dc:creator: @Zecronious Zecronious
item.description:
@Zecronious wrote:

I’m not familiar with server.Server but you need to call the process just before the pause or otherwise that happens.

@echo off
title Exilium Server
start java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; call server.Server
pause

Read full topic
item.source: My run.bat Opens and close immidiately (server sided)
